jobMapping.description: Mapping of JobIDs to node selectors for pod scheduling. Example: { "123": { "node-type": "gpu" }, "456": { "instance-type": "memory-optimized" } }

^[0-9]+$.description: Node selector configuration for a specific JobID. Each property represents a Kubernetes node label (key-value pair).

additionalProperties.description: The value for a node label. Must follow Kubernetes label value format (RFC 1123).

propertyNames.description: Node label key. Must follow Kubernetes label key format (RFC 1123 DNS subdomain).
